languages.text: Друкари, уверенные в своем превосходстве, принимают дары, и мощный взрыв уничтожает часть захватчиков. Перед отступлением выжившие друкари мстят, нанеся орбитальный удар по инфраструктуре колонии.

Certain of their superior might, the Drukhari accept the gifts, and a powerful explosion obliterates a part of the invading force. Before retreating, the surviving xenos take their vengeance by delivering an orbital strike on the colony's infrastructure.
languages.original_text: Друкари, уверенные в своем превосходстве, принимают дары, и мощный взрыв уничтожает часть захватчиков. Перед отступлением выжившие друкари мстят, нанеся орбитальный удар по инфраструктуре колонии.

traits.locale_text: Certain of their superior might, the Drukhari accept the gifts, and a powerful explosion obliterates a part of the invading force. Before retreating, the surviving xenos take their vengeance by delivering an orbital strike on the colony's infrastructure.
The battle against the xenos takes an inconceivable number of human lives.

Certain of their superior might, the Drukhari accept the gifts, and a powerful explosion obliterates a part of the invading force. Before retreating, the surviving xenos take their vengeance by delivering an orbital strike on the colony's infrastructure.
The battle against the xenos takes an inconceivable number of human lives.

Certain of their superior might, the Drukhari accept the gifts, and a powerful explosion obliterates a part of the invading force. Before retreating, the surviving xenos take their vengeance by delivering an orbital strike on the colony's infrastructure.

languages.text: Convaincus de leur supériorité, les Drukharis acceptent les cadeaux, et une explosion dévastatrice pulvérise une partie des forces d'invasion. Avant de battre en retraite, les xénos survivants se vengent en lançant une frappe orbitale contre les infrastructures de la colonie.
languages.original_text: Certain of their superior might, the Drukhari accept the gifts, and a powerful explosion obliterates a part of the invading force. Before retreating, the surviving xenos take their vengeance by delivering an orbital strike on the colony's infrastructure.

traits.locale_text: Convaincus de leur supériorité, les Drukharis acceptent les cadeaux, et une explosion dévastatrice pulvérise une partie des forces d'invasion. Avant de battre en retraite, les xénos survivants se vengent en lançant une frappe orbitale contre les infrastructures de la colonie.

languages.text: 自分たちの優位を確信していたデュカーリは贈り物を受け取り、強烈な爆発により、侵略軍の一部は消滅した。生き残った異種族は、撤退する前にコロニーのインフラを軌道上から攻撃し、復讐を果たした。
languages.original_text: Certain of their superior might, the Drukhari accept the gifts, and a powerful explosion obliterates a part of the invading force. Before retreating, the surviving xenos take their vengeance by delivering an orbital strike on the colony's infrastructure.

traits.locale_text: 自分たちの優位を確信していたデュカーリは贈り物を受け取り、強烈な爆発により、侵略軍の一部は消滅した。生き残った異種族は、撤退する前にコロニーのインフラを軌道上から攻撃し、復讐を果たした。

languages.text: 出于傲慢，黑暗灵族接受了这些礼物。随后，船上爆发了一场猛烈的爆炸，消灭了一部分入侵者，黑暗灵族也不得不撤退。但在撤退之前，他们对殖民地的基础设施进行了轨道轰炸，以此复仇。
languages.original_text: Certain of their superior might, the Drukhari accept the gifts, and a powerful explosion obliterates a part of the invading force. Before retreating, the surviving xenos take their vengeance by delivering an orbital strike on the colony's infrastructure.

traits.locale_text: 出于傲慢，黑暗灵族接受了这些礼物。随后，船上爆发了一场猛烈的爆炸，消灭了一部分入侵者，黑暗灵族也不得不撤退。但在撤退之前，他们对殖民地的基础设施进行了轨道轰炸，以此复仇。

languages.text: Convencidos de su superioridad militar, los Drukhari aceptan los regalos, y una brutal explosión aniquila a parte de la fuerza invasora. Antes de retirarse, los xenos supervivientes se vengan lanzando un bombardeo orbital contra las infraestructuras de la colonia.
languages.original_text: Certain of their superior might, the Drukhari accept the gifts, and a powerful explosion obliterates a part of the invading force. Before retreating, the surviving xenos take their vengeance by delivering an orbital strike on the colony's infrastructure.

traits.locale_text: Convencidos de su superioridad militar, los Drukhari aceptan los regalos, y una brutal explosión aniquila a parte de la fuerza invasora. Antes de retirarse, los xenos supervivientes se vengan lanzando un bombardeo orbital contra las infraestructuras de la colonia.

languages.text: Die Drukhari sind sich ihrer Überlegenheit sicher. Sie akzeptieren die Geschenke. Eine gewaltige Explosion löscht einen Teil der Invasionstruppen aus. Bevor die überlebenden Xenos sich zurückziehen, üben sie durch einen Orbitalschlag gegen die Infrastruktur der Kolonie Rache.
languages.original_text: Certain of their superior might, the Drukhari accept the gifts, and a powerful explosion obliterates a part of the invading force. Before retreating, the surviving xenos take their vengeance by delivering an orbital strike on the colony's infrastructure.

traits.locale_text: Die Drukhari sind sich ihrer Überlegenheit sicher. Sie akzeptieren die Geschenke. Eine gewaltige Explosion löscht einen Teil der Invasionstruppen aus. Bevor die überlebenden Xenos sich zurückziehen, üben sie durch einen Orbitalschlag gegen die Infrastruktur der Kolonie Rache.

languages.text: Kibirleri gözlerini kör etmiş olan Drukhariler, hediyeleri kabul ediyor. Devasa bir patlama, işgalcilerin bir kısmını küle çeviriyor. Hayatta kalan zenolar, geri çekilmeden önce koloninin altyapısına bir yörünge bombardımanı düzenleyerek intikamlarını alıyor.
languages.original_text: Certain of their superior might, the Drukhari accept the gifts, and a powerful explosion obliterates a part of the invading force. Before retreating, the surviving xenos take their vengeance by delivering an orbital strike on the colony's infrastructure.
